mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B'

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='U' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기'

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='후기' AND TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND BOARD_TYPE='후기') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM EXCHANGE WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(APPLICATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND STATUS='환불진행중') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM EXCHANGE WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(APPLICATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND STATUS='환전진행중') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND MEMBER_TYPE='U') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND MEMBER_TYPE='B') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM PARKING_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND PARKING_LIST_STATUS='변경중') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL

SELECT ((SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='충전') - (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='결제취소')) AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND BOARD_TYPE='사업자문의') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
SELECT (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND BOARD_TYPE='관리자문의') AS DAYZERO FROM DUAL
